fields.name: Magic Mirror
fields.description: Gaze into the Magic Mirror and reveal the truth you seek! A mystical relic from the Queen's castle, this enchanted mirror answers your questions with cryptic clarity. Beware—its insights are as honest as they are profound.

fields.name: Magic Lamp
fields.description: Unlock the wonders of the Magic Lamp! This ancient treasure grants three wishes to those daring enough to rub its surface. Bound by cosmic laws, its genie promises adventure, mischief, and perhaps a touch of magic to change your destiny.

fields.name: Rapunzel's Hairbrush
fields.description: Let your hair shine with the magic of Rapunzel’s enchanted hairbrush! Said to hold traces of the golden flower’s healing power, this elegant brush detangles effortlessly and leaves a radiant, silky glow. A perfect blend of beauty and magic for any aspiring royal.

fields.name: Captain Hook's Hook
fields.description: Command fear and respect on the high seas with Captain Hook’s iconic hook! Forged from gleaming steel and worn with the tales of Neverland, this menacing accessory is a must-have for any aspiring pirate captain.

fields.name: Enchanted Rose
fields.description: A symbol of timeless love, the Enchanted Rose holds the power to change fate. Encased in a glass dome, it slowly loses its petals, each falling like a moment of magic and wonder. Perfect for lovers and dreamers alike.

fields.name: Magic Carpet
fields.description: Fly through the skies with the enchanted Magic Carpet, a wondrous item that grants the ability to soar above the clouds. Known for its vibrant colors and unmatched comfort, it’s the perfect travel companion for adventurers seeking both style and speed. A must-have for any daring journey, whether through enchanted cities or across desert sands.
